news_header: Italy has transported asylum seekers to Albania under a new agreement.
news_text: Italy has begun transporting thousands of asylum seekers across the Mediterranean to Albania, following a new arrangement between the two countries. The Italian naval patrol ship Libra recently arrived at Shengjin Harbor in Albania with 16 men from Bangladesh and Egypt on board. These individuals are seeking asylum in Albania. This system has faced criticism from human rights organizations, as it is the first of its kind in Europe.
